item.title: Trump: Cook Appears to Be Engaging in Misconduct
item.description: On August 27th, US President Trump (referring to Fed Governor Cook) stated, "We are prepared to engage in a legal battle. It appears that Cook has engaged in improper conduct. We need an individual who is one hundred percent honest and upright." (FXStreet)BlockBeats reported yesterday that US President Trump signed a document to remove Fed Governor Cook from his position with immediate effect. Trump said in the document: "Pursuant to Article II of the US Constitution and the amended Federal Reserve Act of 1913, which grants me the authority, I hereby dismiss Cook from the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System. Given Cook's lack of honesty in financial matters and the potential for involvement in criminal activities, I have no confidence in your integrity. At the very least, these actions expose serious negligence in your financial transactions, casting doubt on your ability and credibility as a financial regulator."

item.title: U.S. President Trump: Will Soon Occupy Majority of Seats on Federal Reserve
item.description: On August 27th, U.S. President Trump said, "I have a person in mind to take the place of Fed Chair Powell. We will soon obtain the majority at the Fed. We might transfer Milan to another more long-term Fed position." (FXStreet)

item.title: The U.S. Department of Commerce will start publishing statistical data on the blockchain and is finalizing the details to use the blockchain to publish GDP.
item.description: On August 27th, U.S. Commerce Secretary Raimondo announced that the Department of Commerce is about to commence the publication of statistical data related to the blockchain. We are currently in the process of finalizing the details regarding the utilization of the blockchain to publish GDP.

item.title: Bousquet: The Federal Reserve's independence comes from its political arrangement, and public trust is the sole source of its credibility.
item.description: August 27: U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen stated that the independence of the Fed is established on a political framework, and public trust is the sole element that endows the Fed with its credibility. (Xinhua Finance)

item.title: Federal Reserve's Barkin: If the economy continues to perform well, interest rates are expected to be adjusted gradually
item.description: On August 27th, Federal Reserve's Powell stated that, considering his expectation that economic activity will remain relatively stable for the rest of the year, interest rates will experience a moderate adjustment. He said, "I perceive the economy operating in a moderate manner. If the economy operates moderately, it implies that interest rates will also adjust moderately." "I'm not certain whether the economy will truly develop in such a moderate way. We'll have to wait and observe. Therefore, this is my forecast, but forecasts are subject to change." Powell declined to provide details on the action he would be inclined to take in September. "I'm aware that there are three and a half weeks until the next meeting. On that day, based on all the available information, I will make the best judgment possible." (FXStreet)

item.title: In the past 24 hours, the entire network has seen $777 million in liquidations, with long positions taking the biggest hit.
item.description: On August 27th, according to Coinglass data, a total of $777 million was liquidated across the network in the past 24 hours. Among them, there were $646 million in long liquidations and $131 million in short liquidations.

item.title: Justin Sun: Meme Coin is the transformation of internet attention into money.
item.description: On August 27th, Justin Sun stated in a recent interview with The Late Point that meme coins are centered around transforming internet attention into money. For instance, issuing a Biden coin at present would not attract any buyers because Biden has not yet completed the transition from being the name of the U.S. president to an IP or a particular type of meme. There exists a substantial gap between coins that anyone can issue and having the issued token be recognized, and one must excel in the internet attention economy in order to become a winner.

item.title: NMR Surges Past $11, Up Over 33% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 27th, based on market data, Numerai (NMR) has risen above $11 and is now trading at $11.16, with a 24-hour price increase of 33.69%.Previously reported, Numerai received a commitment of up to $500 million in investment from JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Numerai has received a commitment for up to $500 million in investment from JPMorgan Chase.
item.description: On August 27th, as reported by Bloomberg, Numerai LLC based in San Francisco has declared that it has obtained a commitment of up to $500 million in investment from JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Coinbase International will list perpetual contracts for GMT, OMNI, and SNX
item.description: On August 27th, according to official information, Coinbase International is going to list GMT, OMNI, and SNX perpetual contracts.
